author: geirm
msg: The Great Escape.  Changes escape handling to be less invasive - the only time \ acts as
an escape character is when it is in front of a valid reference in the context, or a valid
VTL directive (so \#set is output as #set and \#schmoo is output as \#schmoo). See my post
to the list(s) explaining in more detail if needed.

msg: Added target for the forum demo. ANT Rocks!!!!

msg: - we can now get the literal value for any node easily.
